effect.en: Heal all damage from 2 of your Benched Pokémon.
effect.fr: Soignez tous les dégâts de 2 de vos Pokémon de Banc.
effect.es: Cura todos los puntos de daño a 2 de tus Pokémon en Banca.
effect.it: Cura due dei tuoi Pokémon in panchina da tutti i danni.
effect.pt: Cure todo o dano de 2 dos seus Pokémon no Banco.
effect.de: Heile allen Schaden bei 2 Pokémon auf deiner Bank.

description.en: The patterns on this Pokémon's wings depend on the climate and topography of its habitat. It scatters colorful scales.
